title: Chirorin Mura Monogatari (Nutsberry Town)
synopsis: * Based on Chirorin Mura To Kurumi No Ki (Chirorin Village and the Walnut Tree), a children's puppet show broadcast on NHK between 1959 and 1964. This series was brought back to exploit parents' nostalgia.
staff: [['Yamayoshi, Yasuo', ['Director']], ['Yamada, Etsuji', ['Sound Director']], ['Sayama, Kiyoko', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Iwane, Masaaki', ['Storyboard', ' Animation Director', ' Key Animation']]]
